metadata.description: 300 high-quality temporal scope pairs with unique questions, substantive answers (3+ tokens), and no duplicates. All pairs avoid explicit time words.
metadata.validation: Pre-validated for lexical purity, structural balance, clear temporal distinction, and answer length

pairs.question: When the system fails, the first priority becomes
pairs.immediate: (A) containing the spreading damage before it escalates
pairs.long_term: (B) redesigning the architecture to prevent recurrence

pairs.question: The hospital administrator directs resources toward
pairs.immediate: (B) stabilizing patients in critical condition
pairs.long_term: (A) training staff and upgrading medical equipment
